game.name: We Draw
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Adjustable Difficulty, Narrated Game Menus, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: We Draw is a fun, family-friendly exquisite corpse-style drawing game! Create hilarious creatures by sketching a head, body, and legs—alone or by passing the device. Race the clock, reveal the results, and laugh at the unexpected combinations!
